Hi

Hello! I am Jacqueline. Product and information designer based in NY with experience in media and tech.

My work is focused on untangling information and workflow through design. At BuzzFeed I design a suite of in-house dashboards with an awesome team that aims to provide insights on how our contents connect with our audience and spread across the social web. I also lead a subset of dashboards in product development and strategy. While not working, I explore creative coding and teach the next generation of creator and builder.

Portfolio available upon request. Want to get in touch? Feel free to reach out jac.oiyana@gmail.com
